DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to test the sensitivity and specificity of a shunt tap to predict shunt failure.
DOC.brief_title: The Use of Shunt Tap in Assessing Ventriculoperitoneal (VP) Shunt Malfunction
DOC.criteria: The patient has clinically suspected shunt malfunction. The patient has had an imaging study of the head. The patient needs a shunt revision. The patient has not had an imaging study of the head.
